snippet.title: Playtest Uncured Now | Prototype 0.2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Heya there!

It is time to announce the second ever playtests for our indie game title. Help us build and improve our rogue-lite rpg platformer by testing its combat and trying out our brand-new weapons.

See you another time :)

----
PLAYTEST SIGN UPS: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc9PW8IM5fFhDtvPMSxqJBhdXenI-PLUgHtqRMqnEKfWKNzlw/viewform?usp=sharing

Wishlist Uncured on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2204990/Uncured/
----

Music : 
„Metal (Dark Matter)“ by Alex Grohl [ https://pixabay.com/de/music/metall-metal-dark-matter-111451/ ]  License

---- 
Join the Realm on Discord: https://endrealm.net/discord/
About Uncured: https://uncured.net/
About Endrealm: https://endrealm.net/


Twitch: https://twitch.tv/endrealm/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/uncuredthegame/ 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/uncuredthegame/ 

----

Endrealm is a hobbyist game dev team based in Germany, but welcome to team members all around the world. Our goal is to learn how to make games together and provide a space for people to get their first introduction into the industry.
